Text:
This is a "on and off" kind of thing.  I've managed to download the first 6 torrents and am "stuck" at 44% in the 7th.  Going to start this one now.  I Upload all of them whenever I'm on (I'm barely downloading anything else because I'm using my time on this instead).  But I can only upload so much (384 down/256 up) and where I live, there are 2 blackouts every day, so...

The uploader (davethenave) seeds, it just takes him a long time to seed.  he most probably downloads stuff and leaves these hanging.  But don't worry, at least he will upload them.

Only thing you can do is at least leave any other torrents from this series (disks 1 - 8) seeding, as I do (even though it only usually uploads in 2 of them), to help everyone out.

Hope you continue seeding and posting the whole series of movies, Davethenave.
well, davethenave seems to have abandoned us all...i'll seed a bit more but anincomplete torrent just plain sucks.

If you couldn't find this one before try again. Lost internet connection for a few months. Sorry. Doing the best I can.  
All 25 lessons are going up.    Only take the mp4 torrents.

More of the TEFL video course:

This video course is much better than the Live class offered by TEFLINTERNATIONAL.

Thank you:

All who  seed this series of 25 disk. It's a long list and large files.

I'm asking your help. 

Please... After you complete a download Leave it to seed until a couple more people can take your place.

I've tried off and on for more than a year to make this teaching course available.

This is my last run. 

I'll be off the net in a couple of weeks. 

It's up to you whether these torrents live or die.
